tool.name: umiwhitelist
tool.description: Identify correct cell barcodes - more info : "umi_tools whitelist -help"

param.name: bc_pattern
param.label: Barcode pattern (identifies bases position) - N = UMI position (required) ; C = cell barcode position (optional) ; X = sample position (optional)

param.name: set_cell_number
param.label: Explicity set the number of cell barcodes which should be accepted - Usage : set-cell-number=1000 - Default value 0 means no set cell number

param.name: expect_cells
param.label: Upper limit estimate for the number of inputted cells - Usage : expect-cells=1000 - Default value : 0 means no expected cells number
